Class Hand

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nickeson.game.cardgame.blackjack.Hand

  • public class Hand
extends java.lang.Object
    Title: Hand.java

    Project: Card Games

    Description: A Player's collection of Playing Cards

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2016

    Company: Silicon Mountain Technologies

    Since:
    May 17, 2016

    updates:

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Hand()
      default constructor builds empty Hand
      Hand(java.util.List<Card> hand)
      convenience constructor - pass a List of Cards to build Hand

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addCard(Card c)
      Add a specific Card to the Hand
      void addCard(java.util.List<Card> cards)
      Add multiple Cards to the Hand
      int calcValue()
      calculate the Blackjack Hand's point value (uses Ace as point value of 1 to avoid 'Busting', when possible
      void clear()
      Remove all Cards from the Hand instance
      boolean inHand(Card c)
      returns a boolean result of whether or not Card exists in Hand
      void removeCard(Card c)
      Remove a specific Card from the Hand
      void removeCard(java.util.List<Card> cards)
      Remove multiple Cards from the Hand
      int size()
      returns the number of Cards in the Hand
      void sortByIndexValue()
      Sorts the cards in the Hand so that cards of the same indexValue are grouped together, and within an indexValue the Cards are sorted by suit - indexValues proceed in an ascending fashion
      void sortBySuit()
      Sorts the cards in the Hand so that cards of the same suit are grouped together, and within a suit the cards are sorted by value ascending.
      java.lang.String toString()
      print value of Hand as String instead of hashcode

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

      • inHand

        public boolean inHand(Card c)
        returns a boolean result of whether or not Card exists in Hand
        Parameters:
        c - the Card to check if it exists in Hand
        Returns:
        a boolean result of whether or not Card exists in Hand

      • sortBySuit

        public void sortBySuit()
        Sorts the cards in the Hand so that cards of the same suit are grouped together, and within a suit the cards are sorted by value ascending.

      • sortByIndexValue

        public void sortByIndexValue()
        Sorts the cards in the Hand so that cards of the same indexValue are grouped together, and within an indexValue the Cards are sorted by suit - indexValues proceed in an ascending fashion

      • calcValue

        public int calcValue()
        calculate the Blackjack Hand's point value (uses Ace as point value of 1 to avoid 'Busting', when possible
        Returns:
        the Blackjack Hand's point value (uses Ace as point vlaue of 1 to avoid 'Busting', when possible

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Remove all Cards from the Hand instance

      • size

        public int size()
        returns the number of Cards in the Hand
        Returns:
        the number of Cards in the Hand

        public java.lang.String toString()
        print value of Hand as String instead of hashcode

        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        the String value of the Hand
